programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: When an athletic and popular college student is violently murdered in her apartment, police track down several surprising suspects, including one with a disturbing obsession, before crucial evidence unmasks a dangerous predator no one saw coming.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: A fun-loving 59-year-old man is found shot to death in his home and his beloved jewelry collection has been stolen, leading detectives to a long list of suspects and a killer harboring a dark secret.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: A restaurant is robbed and the night manager murdered, leading police to investigate suspicious co-workers, a disgruntled ex-employee and a violent serial attacker.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: Detectives investigate a secret affair, a kidnapping plot and a racist gang when a young husband-to-be is found shot and stabbed.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: When a devoted mother is stabbed to death in a horrifying attack, suspicion falls on those closest to her; a cryptic note and a violent crime spree baffle detectives at first, but they eventually track down a deranged killer no one predicted.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: A vibrant young mother of three is murdered in the safety of her own home and investigators look to a history of troubled romances, but when the case goes cold and police can't find the killer, a phone call leads to a culprit hiding in plain sight.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: An assassination, a bitter custody dispute and a gunman's cryptic words send police scrambling on an interstate hunt to find the killer of a beloved father and husband.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: When the strangling death of a young mother and bride-to-be baffles police, detectives probe a workplace grievance in search of a killer, before a cherished possession provides a link to the crime and cracks the case wide open.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: A wealthy trader and father of four is gunned-down at home while his family is tied up in a closet; police dig into affairs, mob links and a missing co-worker, until a new lead and a taped phone call reveal a plot decades later.

programme.title: An Unexpected Killer
programme.desc: When a young mother is found dead in a field after a night out, police scour security video to retrace a suspect's steps; the discovery of a second crime scene leads to an arrest, before high-tech forensics reveal a truth no one expected.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: What started as a perfect marriage evolves into a threesome; after one of the participants winds up dead, the killer turns out to be someone the investigators never suspected.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: When a psychic and her adult daughter are found killed under bizarre circumstances, the list of suspects grows long as investigators discover that male escorts, blackmail, fraud and love spells all played a part in this chilling double murder.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: A mom starts online dating to try and cope after an unexpected tragedy, but when she gets pulled into the underbelly of the BDSM world and then disappears, investigators spend over a year unraveling this dark mystery.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: A loving grandmother from a traveling community is found brutally murdered, shocking all; investigators soon uncover a web of lies, identity theft and millions in insurance fraud that point to who killed this sweet old lady.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: When a man is shot dead in bed right next to his fianc√©e, detectives learn that anyone's past can come back to haunt them.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: A young mother is brutally murdered but despite unique evidence at the scene, it takes years to put the pieces together and bring her killer to justice.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: A wealthy entrepreneur is shot in his home; there are many suspects but with only suspicion to go on, it takes investigators over seven years to nab his killer.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: Lust and greed are at the core of the case of a wife and mother who is found dead in her pool; investigators are quick to uncover a web of affairs, lies and fraud that lead them to her killer.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: A single mother is found dead in a hotel stairwell and detectives quickly uncover that she had a secret life that may have led to her demise.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: When a police officer goes missing, it becomes apparent he is the victim of a jealous wrath.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: Three members of a wealthy family are gunned down in their own home; with little evidence to go on, investigators embark on a multi-year surveillance operation to see if they can prove their instincts are correct.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: A beloved entrepreneur is murdered in his office; a secret double life is quickly revealed, and despite mountains of suspicion, lies and motives, his killer is not who one would assume.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: A man is found dead in the shower, and police have only two suspects, but to figure out who killed him and why, is not as cut and dry as it may seem.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: A teenage girl is found beaten to death at the neighborhood pool, launching her father on a mission to catch her killer that ultimately changes crime fighting forever.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: A brutal attack leaves witness to a murder; but when the police find the killer, it turns out the intended victim, and the motive, were not what anyone imagined.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: When a prominent attorney is found savagely stabbed to death in her office, investigators find themselves with a long list of suspects from violent felons to lesbian love triangles; in the end, they find a killer as cold as they come.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: What originally looks like a heart attack turns out to be a calculated execution; soon, detectives unravel a murder plot that hits a little too close to home.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: After a woman is found shot dead, with her 9-month-old daughter in the next room, detectives uncover a web of late-night encounters, secret lovers and seething jealousy.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: A woman is found stabbed to death in her apartment; with a long list of admirers, investigators uncover secret obsessions leading to a sadistic killer suspected by no one.

programme.title: In Ice Cold Blood
programme.desc: A single mother is strangled to death in the middle of a Hawaiian paradise; investigators quickly focus in on two suspects, but nothing comes easy as they spend more than a decade striving to bring her killer to justice.
